channel.title: ~~PkIsle X Official Trailer #1
channel.description:
Hey PkIsle Players,
I Got Bezza Permtion To Post This Here.
this is just to give you the link so you can look at our first trailer. It didn't really turn out to be what i wanted but i think it gets the point across. I'd like everyone to spam this across forums, so we can grow and hopefully get 400 members before 6th august
A new generation of runescape featuring lot's of new exiciting adventures and minigames. Runescape left it's wilderness and pking in the shadows but now PkIsle X has brought it back to what it once was and developed far greater than it ever was.
To register on the site go www.pkislex.net and then click forums. PkIsle X will be released on 6th August.
Here's a quick vid to show you a few features it's got. Khazard adventure and gladiators will be in Trailer #2
http://www.youtube.com/v/A1n7K-exEY4
Or download it here for better quality
http://files.filefront.com//;8209264;;/
~~ Bezza

and lostandfound add bezza on msn and be active on forum and he might make u a beta tester like me =p
